title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: Hence it happened that he shouted out the hour, which was
quote_last: , in his big voice through the growing twilight; and somehow the loudness of it made it seem like the proclamation of something tremendous.
title: The Oracle of the Dog
author: G.K.Chesterton

quote_last: - or, to put it another, blunter way, an hour and twenty minutes past what seemed to be all reasonable hope - the unmarried bride, her head down, a parent stationed on either side of her, was helped out of the building…
title: Raise High the Roof Beam, Carpenters
author: J. D. Salinger
